locations.name: Main Park
locations.schedule: Every Saturday from 9 AM to 2 PM
locations.description: Join us for a cozy morning with fresh brews and baked goods in the heart of the park.

locations.name: Farmers Market
locations.schedule: Every Sunday from 8 AM to 1 PM
locations.description: Find us at the market for a delightful selection of pastries and coffee to start your day.

locations.name: Community Events
locations.schedule: Check our social media for updates
locations.description: We pop up at community events throughout the month. Follow us to catch our next stop!
